resources.string:
Muhammad Sajjad Amin
Batch: 211
Department of CSE
Green University of Bangladesh

Greentact consists of Green and Contact. It helps to rapidly communicate to any department of the Green University of Bangladesh.
It is not an official app of GUB. All phone numbers and emails are collected from green.edu.bd/contact

Share this app:
Do you want to delete this contact?
Name and Phone must not be empty and phone should be more than 10 digit
